up.description: Use this command to wake up a device by sending a magic packet to it

options.name: -c <seconds>
options.description: Continuous sending of packets, at a given interval.

list.description: This command will list all the stored devices with their corresponding MAC address

options.name: -s <column>
options.description: Sort the list by the given column.

options.name: -r
options.description: Sort the list in the reverse order.

add.description: To store a new device in you wakefile use this command

rm.description: If you want to remove a saved device this command is what you are looking for

main.description: The wake command lets you manage the MAC address of your devices and send magic packets to them.

options.name: -v
options.description: Print the version of the wake command.
